title: Zorin OS: The Perfect Linux Distro for Migrating From Windows
author: Jack Wallen
description: Whether you have experience with Linux or not, Zorin OS makes the migration from either Windows or macOS a breeze.
cntitle: Zorin OS：从 Windows 迁移的完美 Linux 发行版
cndescription: 无论您是否有 Linux 使用经验，Zorin OS 都可以轻松地从 Windows 或 macOS 迁移。
